This was beautiful. Although like what few other comments said, their realization and coming to terms with each other was pretty rushed, I have to admit. But I chalk it up to this being a doujin. Usually these are done by solo artists. Not everyone is fortunate enough to have a mangaka team to make it. So it can be very trying to make a long doujin, esp in this kind of good quality drawing. Not to mention, they have to meet the deadline by the time a Comiket arrives. So all is forgiven. Especially since the chad thief finally is portrayed as being justified. Loser beta cucks must always lose, one way or another. And no whoring out the waifu for prostitution or group sex/gangbang like a town bicycle either! Those tags can make NTR so garbage for me... So the fact that there is just actual love behind the stealing? "True Love" indeed. I so love this kind of story! This is the kind of NTR I've been waiting for! Well done, author. You get my full seal of approval! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Mixed feelings certainly. But despite the author setting it up so we hate Kousuke I think he is the least hateable of the three. Yes, he is a douche for saying he is not Saruwatari's friend (even though he is clearly doing it to please Saeko) and kind of a wuss for leaving Saeko to get raped but I hate how everyone demands perfection of him when Saruwatari fuckin blackmailed and raped her and, worst offender of all, how Saeko did a 180º so hard I got whiplash on her feelings for Kousuke. Then it just got worse when Saeko and Saruwatari start flirting in front of Kousuke like they don't have unresolved issues to sort out with him. No wonder the dude got all creepy in the end, how would one respond when someone rapes your gf and next time you see her she is all over her rapist like she never had feeling for you without giving you a chance to respond to anything?
